outboundReferences.contextLine: With Azure App Service you can both [[scale-up-down]] and [[scale-in-out]].
With Azure App Service you can both [[scale-up-down]] and [[scale-in-out]].
Each App Service belongs to an [[azure-app-service-plan]], which defines the compute capabilities.
There are two main deployment types, depending on the [[azure-app-service-plan]].

inboundReferences.contextLine: This page lists some scripts useful for operating with [[azure-app-service]].
An [[azure-app-service]] always runs in an App Service plan, which defines the set of compute resources available to the app.
Azure DevTest Labs is a tool to create and manage [[iaas]] (like [[azure-virtual-machines]]) and [[paas]] (like [[azure-app-service]]) instances for dev and test environments.

fields.title: AZ-204 - Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
AZ-204 - Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure

inboundReferences.contextLine: - [[azure-app-service]]: Web apps, API apps, WebJobs, Mobile Apps
It works with several PaaS services, such as [[azure-app-service]], [[Azure SQL]], and [[azure-storage-account]]. It watches for anomalies in the activity logs.
